title: Otogi
synopsis:
Eve's first press limited edition release of their Otogi album CD includes an accompanying DVD. Eve is known as a musician and lyricist for Vocaloid videos but this CD+DVD release features only his "self-covers" where he is providing the vocals rather than a Vocaloid.

This entry encompasses the official music videos published on the Otogi DVD release. Refer to the More Info section for details.
